title: #HwSyslogService.v1_0_0.HwSyslogService

ImportCrl.description: Imports a syslog server certificate CRL.
ImportCrl.longDescription: Imports a syslog server certificate CRL.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SubmitTestEvent.description: Used to test whether the syslog channel is available.
SubmitTestEvent.longDescription: Used to test whether the syslog channel is available.

enumDescriptions.Critical: Indicates that only critical alarms are sent.
enumDescriptions.Major: Indicates that alarms of Major and higher severity levels are sent, that is, Major and Critical alarms are sent.
enumDescriptions.Minor: Indicates that alarms of Minor and higher severity levels are sent, that is, Minor, Major, and Critical alarms are sent.
enumDescriptions.Normal: Indicates that alarms of Normal and higher severity levels are sent, that is, Normal, Minor, Major, and Critical alarms are sent.

enumDescriptions.OneWay: Only the syslog server certificate is authenticated.
enumDescriptions.TwoWay: Certificates of both the syslog server and the client are authenticated.

CrlVerificationEnabled.description: Indicate that whether certificate revocation verification by CRL is enabled.
CrlVerificationEnabled.longDescription: Indicate that whether certificate revocation verification by CRL is enabled.

CrlValidFrom.description: Starting date of the validity period of the CRL.
CrlValidFrom.longDescription: Starting date of the validity period of the CRL.

CrlValidTo.description: Expiry date of the validity period of the CRL.
CrlValidTo.longDescription: Expiry date of the validity period of the CRL.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Subject.description: The entity to which the certificate was issued.
Subject.longDescription: The entity to which the certificate was issued.

Issuer.description: The Certificate Authority that issued the certificate.
Issuer.longDescription: The Certificate Authority that issued the certificate.

ValidNotBefore.description: The date on which the certificate validity period begins.
ValidNotBefore.longDescription: The date on which the certificate validity period begins.

ValidNotAfter.description: The date on which the certificate validity period end.
ValidNotAfter.longDescription: The date on which the certificate validity period end.

SerialNumber.description: A numerical identifier to represent the physical security sensor.
SerialNumber.longDescription: The serial number that the Certificate Authority assigned to the certificate.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ServiceEnabled.description: This indicates whether this service is enabled.
ServiceEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this service is enabled.

MessageFormat.description: Specifies the format of the syslog messages to be reported to a third-party server.
MessageFormat.longDescription: Specifies the format of the syslog messages to be reported to a third-party server.

AlarmSeverity.description: Specifies the Severity of alarms to be reported as syslog packets to a third-party server.
AlarmSeverity.longDescription: Specifies the severity of alarms to be reported as syslog packets to a third-party server.

TransmissionProtocol.description: Specifies the protocol used for transmitting syslog packets between iBMC and the syslog server.
TransmissionProtocol.longDescription: Specifies the protocol used for transmitting syslog packets between iBMC and the syslog server.

AuthenticateMode.description: The authentication mode needs to be set when Transmission Protocol is TLS.
AuthenticateMode.longDescription: The authentication mode needs to be set when Transmission Protocol is TLS.

RootCertificate.description: Indicates information about the server root certificate uploaded.
RootCertificate.longDescription: Indicates information about the server root certificate uploaded.

ClientCertificate.description: Indicates information about the server root certificate uploaded.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

HwSyslogService.description: This is the base type for resources and referenceable members.

enumDescriptions.OperationLog: Indicates that only operation log is sent.
enumDescriptions.SecurityLog: Indicates that only security log is sent.
enumDescriptions.EventLog: Indicates that only system event log is sent.

enumDescriptions.Custom: Use the customized format for system logs.
enumDescriptions.RFC3164: Use the RFC3164 format for system logs.

enumDescriptions.BoardSN: Use board serial number for server identity source.
enumDescriptions.ProductAssetTag: Use product asset tag for server identity source.
enumDescriptions.HostName: Use host name for server identity source.
enumDescriptions.ChassisName: Use chassis name for server identity source.
enumDescriptions.ChassisLocation: Use chassis location for server identity source.
enumDescriptions.ChassisSerialNumber: Use chassis serial number for server identity source.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MemberId.description: This is the identifier for the member within the collection.
MemberId.longDescription: The value of this string shall uniquely identify the member within the collection.

Enabled.description: Indicates whether the channel is enabled.
Enabled.longDescription: Indicates whether the channel is enabled.

Address.description: Indicates the address of the syslog server.
Address.longDescription: Indicates the address of the syslog server.

Port.description: Indicates the port number of the syslog server.
Port.longDescription: Indicates the port number of the syslog server.

LogType.description: Indicates the type of logs in the syslog packets.
LogType.longDescription: Indicates the type of logs in the syslog packets.

enumDescriptions.UDP: Indicates a connectionless protocol that does not establish a connection between the sender and the receiver before data transmission.
enumDescriptions.TCP: ndicates a connection-oriented protocol that establishes a reliable connection between the sender and the receiver before data transmission.
enumDescriptions.TLS: Indicates a connection-oriented protocol that ensures confidentiality and integrity of the transmitted data.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.
